item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

ok well im using Fr33sc4p3 as my source and i dont like the doors to train str so i wanted a manhole to train str so when you click on it it will train str but idk whats wrong… i added this case under case 823 or what evr the dummy case is.

case 2543: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You open the heavy manhole and get strength xp"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[0]), 0); actionTimer = 12; } break;
but it doesnt train str for some reason… do i need to add the object id somewher else or something? or should i make case 1531 (the door case that trains str. or whatever) to case 2543 (manhole) so just edit that 1 part in the door case?
